abstract: Orbis Investment Management, which owns 6.9 percent of Nikko, said in a statement that Citigroup’s offer was “unacceptable.”

lead_paragraph: Citigroup’s $10.8 billion takeover offer for the Nikko Cordial Corporation, a Japanese brokerage firm, has been rejected by a fourth shareholder.
